item.title: Vengeance timer
item.dc:creator: @chesslemac chesslemac
item.description:
@chesslemac wrote:

Well i know this is really nooby of me, but i just dont know where the timer for this code is could anyone please help me. :o

case 162: { if(playerIsMember == 0) if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 20; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } }
